articles.title: New COVID variant driving up cases in parts of the world, WHO says - PBS
articles.description: A new variant of COVID-19 is circulating in parts of the world and may be driving an increase in cases in the eastern Mediterranean, Southeast Asia and western Pacific regions.
articles.content: COVID-19 cases are rising again as a new variant begins to circulate in some parts of the world. The World Health Organization said Wednesday the rise in cases is primarily in the eastern Mediterrane… [+1586 chars]
